message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product to you, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price.  How about $16,250? That would be a good compromise for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am still unable to go above $15,000 for this product. Would $15,000 be acceptable to you?
